languages.text: "Обнуленным. Миссия данной единицы завершена, функция — не ясна". {n}На мгновение во взгляде Паскаля мелькает тень смятения, но техножрец быстро подавляет вспышку несанкционированных эмоций, и вокс его с некоторым вызовом изрекает:{/n} "Единица намеревается определить себе новую функцию и новую миссию. Стагнация неприемлема для воина Кода".

"Reset. This unit's mission is complete. Its function is unclear." {n}A hint of dismay flashes in Pasqal's eyes for an instant, before the Tech-Priest quickly suppresses that unauthorised emotional outburst and his vox says, somewhat defiantly,{/n} "The unit intends to set itself a new function and mission. To a warrior of the Code, stagnation is unacceptable."
languages.original_text: "Обнуленным. Стагнация неприемлема для воина Кода".

To a warrior of the Code, stagnation is unacceptable."

languages.text: “复位。本单位的使命已经完成，后续功能尚未阐明。”{n}帕斯卡眼中瞬间闪过一丝沮丧，但他很快地克制住了这种未经授权的情绪爆发。他的音阵合成器中发出了带有挑战意味的声音。{/n}“本单位准备自行设置新的功能与任务。对于神圣代码的战士而言，停滞不前是不可接受的行为。”
languages.original_text: "Reset. This unit's mission is complete. Its function is unclear." {n}A hint of dismay flashes in Pasqal's eyes for an instant, before the Tech-Priest quickly suppresses that unauthorised emotional outburst and his vox says, somewhat defiantly,{/n} "The unit intends to set itself a new function and mission. To a warrior of the Code, stagnation is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: “复位。此单位的使命已经完成，后续功能尚未阐明。”{n}帕斯卡眼中瞬间闪过一丝沮丧，但他很快地克制住了这种未经授权的情绪爆发。他的音阵合成器中发出了带有挑战意味的声音。{/n}“此单位准备自行设置新的功能与任务。对于神圣代码的战士而言，停滞不前是不可接受的行为。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Reinicio. La misión de esta unidad ha sido completada. Su función no queda clara». {n}Un destello de consternación cruza fugazmente los ojos de Pasqal antes de que el tecnosacerdote reprima el arrebato emocional no autorizado. Su voco, un tanto desafiante, exclama:{/n} «La unidad tiene intención de establecer una nueva función y misión, Para un guerrero del Código, el estancamiento es inaceptable».
languages.original_text: "Reset. This unit's mission is complete. Its function is unclear." {n}A hint of dismay flashes in Pasqal's eyes for an instant, before the Tech-Priest quickly suppresses that unauthorised emotional outburst and his vox says, somewhat defiantly,{/n} "The unit intends to set itself a new function and mission. To a warrior of the Code, stagnation is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: «Reinicio. La misión de esta unidad ha sido completada. Su función no queda clara». {n}Un destello de consternación cruza fugazmente los ojos de Pasqal antes de que el tecnosacerdote reprima el arrebato emocional no autorizado. Su voco, un tanto desafiante, exclama:{/n} «La unidad tiene intención de establecer una nueva función y misión, Para un guerrero del Código, el estancamiento es inaceptable».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「リセット。このユニットの使命は完了した。機能は不明」{n}パスカルの目に一瞬落胆の色が浮かんだが、技術司祭はすぐさまその無許可の感情の発露を抑える。彼のヴォクスはやや反抗的にこう告げた。{/n}「同ユニットは新たな機能と使命を自らに課すつもりだ。コードの戦士にとって、停滞は受け入れがたいものだ」
languages.original_text: "Reset. This unit's mission is complete. Its function is unclear." {n}A hint of dismay flashes in Pasqal's eyes for an instant, before the Tech-Priest quickly suppresses that unauthorised emotional outburst and his vox says, somewhat defiantly,{/n} "The unit intends to set itself a new function and mission. To a warrior of the Code, stagnation is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: 「リセット。このユニットの使命は完了した。機能は不明」{n}パスカルの目に一瞬落胆の色が浮かんだが、技術司祭はすぐさまその無許可の感情の発露を抑える。彼のヴォクスはやや反抗的にこう告げた。{/n}「同ユニットは新たな機能と使命を自らに課すつもりだ。コードの戦士にとって、停滞は受け入れがたいものだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Reset. Die Mission dieser Einheit ist abgeschlossen. Ihre Funktion ist unklar." {n}In Pasqals Augen blitzt kurz ein Anflug von Bestürzung auf, ehe der Techpriester diesen nicht autorisierten Emotionsausbruch schnell unterdrückt und sein Vox etwas trotzig sagt:{/n} "Die Einheit beabsichtigt, sich selbst eine neue Funktion und Mission zuzuweisen. Für einen Krieger des Code ist Stagnation inakzeptabel."
languages.original_text: "Reset. This unit's mission is complete. Its function is unclear." {n}A hint of dismay flashes in Pasqal's eyes for an instant, before the Tech-Priest quickly suppresses that unauthorised emotional outburst and his vox says, somewhat defiantly,{/n} "The unit intends to set itself a new function and mission. To a warrior of the Code, stagnation is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: "Reset. Die Mission dieser Einheit ist abgeschlossen. Ihre Funktion ist unklar." {n}In Pasqals Augen blitzt kurz ein Anflug von Bestürzung auf, ehe der Techpriester diesen nicht autorisierten Emotionsausbruch schnell unterdrückt und sein Vox etwas trotzig sagt:{/n} "Die Einheit beabsichtigt, sich selbst eine neue Funktion und Mission zuzuweisen. Für einen Krieger des Code ist Stagnation inakzeptabel."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Réinitialisé. La mission de cette unité est terminée. Sa fonction est maintenant incertaine. » {n}Le regard de Pasqal laisse brièvement transparaître son désarroi, mais le technoprêtre réprime bien vite cet accès d'émotion non autorisé, avant de déclarer d'une voix presque rebelle :{/n} « L'unité prévoit de s'accorder de nouvelles fonction et mission. Pour un guerrier du Code, la stagnation est inacceptable. »
languages.original_text: "Reset. This unit's mission is complete. Its function is unclear." {n}A hint of dismay flashes in Pasqal's eyes for an instant, before the Tech-Priest quickly suppresses that unauthorised emotional outburst and his vox says, somewhat defiantly,{/n} "The unit intends to set itself a new function and mission. To a warrior of the Code, stagnation is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: « Réinitialisé. La mission de cette unité est terminée. Sa fonction est maintenant incertaine. » {n}Le regard de Pasqal laisse brièvement transparaître son désarroi, mais le technoprêtre réprime bien vite cet accès d'émotion non autorisé, avant de déclarer d'une voix presque rebelle :{/n} « L'unité prévoit de s'accorder de nouvelles fonction et mission. Pour un guerrier du Code, la stagnation est inacceptable. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Reset. This unit's mission is complete. Its function is unclear." {n}A hint of dismay flashes in Pasqal's eyes for an instant, before the Tech-Priest quickly suppresses that unauthorised emotional outburst and his vox says, somewhat defiantly,{/n} "The unit intends to set itself a new function and mission. To a warrior of the Code, stagnation is unacceptable."

languages.text: "Sıfırlanmış. Bu birimin görevi tamamlandı. Fonksiyon amacı belirsiz." {n}Pasqal'ın gözlerine bir anlığına dehşet ifadesi hâkim oluyor. Sonrasındaysa Tekno Rahip, bu izinsiz duygusal patlamayı hızla bastırıyor ve voksundan meydan okurcasına sözler dökülüyor. {/n} "Bu birim, kendisine yeni bir fonksiyon ve görev atama niyetinde. Kod savaşçıları için durağanlık kabul edilemezdir."
languages.original_text: "Reset. This unit's mission is complete. Its function is unclear." {n}A hint of dismay flashes in Pasqal's eyes for an instant, before the Tech-Priest quickly suppresses that unauthorised emotional outburst and his vox says, somewhat defiantly,{/n} "The unit intends to set itself a new function and mission. To a warrior of the Code, stagnation is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: "Sıfırlanmış. Bu birimin görevi tamamlandı. Fonksiyon amacı belirsiz." {n}Pasqal'ın gözlerine bir anlığına dehşet ifadesi hâkim oluyor, ardından Tekno Rahip bu izinsiz duygusal patlamayı hızla bastırıyor ve voksundan sanki karşı çıkarcasına bir ses çıkıyor. {/n} "Bu birim kendisine yeni bir fonksiyon ve görev atama niyetinde. Bir Kod savaşçısı için durağanlık kabul edilemezdir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
